content.raw:
some of the remaining launch files still reference deleted files, like [x1_description/launch/description.launch](#!/osrf/subt/src/4dc408e3caa7060ad249e5f5c6da9ed61d50b796/x1_description/launch/description.launch#lines-11) referencing `x1.urdf.xacro`; jenkins catches these issues as test failures
